snippet: Alberto Morales, a Florida prisoner who escaped in Texas while being transported to Nevada, was killed by law enforcement officers trying to apprehend him.
abstract: Alberto Morales, Florida prisoner who escaped in Texas after stabbing detective who was transferring him to Nevada, is shot and killed by law enforcement officers trying to apprehend him.
lead_paragraph: Alberto Morales, a Florida prisoner who escaped in Texas while being transported to Nevada, was killed by law enforcement officers trying to apprehend him.

headline.seo: Florida Prisoner Who Escaped in Texas Is Killed
headline.main: Florida Prisoner Who Fled Is Killed
headline.print_headline: Florida Prisoner Who Fled Is Killed
